summary: ABS PUMP WONT SHUT OFF, CAUSED A DEAD BATTERY WHICH IN TURN CAUSED ME TO BE LATE FOR WORK ON A VERY IMPORTANT DAY AT WORK WHICH CAUSED ME TO BE TRANSFERRED. I WENT TO CHEVY DEALER AND THEY SAID AROUND $1000 TO FIX OR TO PULL THE FUSE. I PULLED THE FUSE BUT I NOW HAVE TO DRIVE AROUND WITH 2 LIGHTS LIT ON MY DASHBOARD AT ALL TIMES. MY NEXT VEHICLE WILL BE A TOYOTA!!!  *JB
